sections.content: By signing up, you agree to Instacart’s
. You agree that your contact information and order information will be shared with {retailer} for marketing purposes.
By signing up, you agree to Instacart’s
. You agree that your contact information and order information will be shared with {retailer} for marketing purposes.

legal.smsLegalString: We will send a text with a verification code. Message and data rates may apply.

forgotPasswordComplete.subtextString: If that email matches an account, you’ll get a link to reset your password within a few minutes.

forgotPassword.subtextString: We’ll send you a link to reset your password.

login.titleKeepShoppingString: Have an account? Log in to keep shopping

existingUser.existingMethodSubtextString: Hey {email}, looks like you already have an Costco Same-Day account. To continue, log in below.

signup.subtextString: Welcome to {retailer}! Enter your email to get started.
signup.subtextShortString: Enter your email to get started.
signup.titleKeepShoppingString: Sign up for free to keep shopping
signup.phoneSubtextString: Welcome to {retailer}! Enter your phone number to get started.
signup.buyNowIncentiveLabelString: Finish your order: Sign up for $0 delivery!
signup.threeFreeDeliveryLabelString: $0 delivery fee on your first 3 orders
signup.employeePromptString: Are you a Costco Same-Day team member?

captureEmail.subtextString: Add a layer of security to your account and never miss an order update.

requestLoginVerificationCode.subtextEmailString: Enter your email to get a one-time login code.

sections.content: Enter the 6-digit code we sent over SMS to

oneTimeCode.subtextEmailLine2String: It expires soon — check your inbox (and spam)
oneTimeCode.resendCodeButtonLabelString: Request a new code in {seconds} seconds

submitSecurityVerificationCode.checkSpamString: Don’t see the email in your Inbox? Check your spam folder.
submitSecurityVerificationCode.resendCodeButtonLabelString: Request a new code in {seconds} seconds

sections.content: We want to make sure your account is secure. Enter the 6-digit verification code we sent to
We want to make sure your account is secure. Enter the 6-digit verification code we sent to your previous email:

requestLoginLink.subtextEmailString: Enter your email to get a one-time login link.

sections.content: We sent a login link to

valueProps.headerString:
Tap a button,
get your groceries
valueProps.subheaderString: Get your groceries delivered or ready for pickup—and spend time on what matters.

valueProps.headerString:
Get quality groceries
picked with care
valueProps.subheaderString: Shoppers pick the highest quality items. That’s our 100% quality promise.

valueProps.headerString:
Shop more deals,
save more with us
valueProps.subheaderString: Save with exclusive deals, coupons, and more—with no membership required!

homeFooter.businessSignUpCtaString: Sign up for Costco Same-Day Business

validationErrors.accountMaintenanceString: We experienced an error processing your request. Please try again.
validationErrors.accountAlreadyExistsString: This email already has an account — log in to continue.
validationErrors.accountsRequiresPasswordResetString: Maintaining your account security is our top priority. It appears your email address and password may have been compromised on another site. As a precautionary measure, please check your email to reset your password.
validationErrors.adminLoginString: We were unable to process your request.  Please utilize the Google sign in option to proceed.
validationErrors.facebookEmailNeededString: We weren’t permitted to read your email address from Facebook which is required to created an account. You may need to go to Facebook to revoke access before you can try again.
validationErrors.forbiddenString: We couldn’t validate the security of this request. Sorry!
validationErrors.generalString: We experienced an error processing your request. Please try again.
validationErrors.invalidCredentialsManyTriesString: Invalid password. We sent an email to help you reset your password.

validationErrors.invalidCredentialsSkippedPasswordString: You’ll need to finish account setup to log in — check your email for instructions.
validationErrors.invalidCredentialsMultipleFailedAttempts: It looks like you’re having trouble with your password. Try logging in with a code instead.
validationErrors.invalidCredentialsSkippedPasswordExistin: You need to set a new password to log in - we have emailed you a password reset link.

validationErrors.invalidEmailIsBlankString: Enter a valid email to continue.
validationErrors.invalidPhoneString: Please enter a valid phone number
validationErrors.membershipNotFoundString: No active Costco Same-Day Member account found with this number
validationErrors.notLinkingBusinessOnlyAccountString: Please login to a business account that isn't connected to a personal account already.
validationErrors.linkingAlreadyConnectedBusinessAccountSt: You are trying to login to a business account that is already connected to a personal account. Please try connecting a separate business account.
validationErrors.linkingAlreadyConnectedPersonalAccountSt: You are trying to login to a personal account that is already connected to a business account. Please try connecting a separate personal account.
validationErrors.linkingCurrentlyLoggedInAccountString: You are already logged in to this account. Please go back to the account menu and convert this to a business account instead.
validationErrors.linkingNonBusinessAccountString: You are trying to login to a non-business account. Please try converting that account to a business account first before connecting.
validationErrors.linkingNonPersonalAccountString: You are trying to login to a non-personal account. Please try converting that account to a personal account first before connecting.
validationErrors.passwordTooShortString: The password you entered is too short. Please choose a password that is at least 8 characters.
validationErrors.passwordTooLongString: The password you entered is too long.
validationErrors.passwordTooCommonString: The password you entered is not secure. Please choose a password that is not a common word or phrase.
validationErrors.phoneUserNotFoundString: Phone login isn’t set up for that number. Try one of these other ways to log in.
validationErrors.phoneTokenExpiredString: That code is expired, resend to try again
validationErrors.emailUserNotFoundString: No account exists with this email address.
validationErrors.generalGoogleString: Google experienced an error while processing your request. Please try another method to log in.
validationErrors.googleCookieString: Google login is unavailable because 3rd party cookies are currently disabled in your browser settings.
validationErrors.rateLimitString: We were unable to process your request due to too many recent attempts.  Please wait a bit before trying again.
validationErrors.invalidBadgeIdString: Please enter a valid 11 digit Card Number
validationErrors.badgeIdMismatchString: Card Number did not match. Please re-enter.
